D., Computer Science (08/2002-09/2007) advised by Prof. Sung Yong Shin, Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST). M. S., Computer Engineering (03/2000 - 02/2002) advised by Prof. Yeong-Gil Shin, Seoul National University. B. S., Computer Science (03/1996 - 02/2000) Seoul National University. Professional Experience Postdoctoral researcher (12/2008 - 1/2012) The Robotics Institute, Carnegie Mellon University. Performed research on character animation using robot control algorithms and dynamics simulation under the supervision of Prof. Jessica K. Hodgins. Postdoctoral researcher (11/2007 - 12/2008) Movement Research Lab (MRL), Dept. Computer Engineering, Seoul National University. Performed research on motion editing and motion classification under the supervision of Prof. Jehee Lee. Research assistant (7/2002 - 5/2006, 8/2006 - 8/2007) Theory and Computation Lab, Div. Computer Science, KAIST. Performed research in the area of on-line character animation under the supervision of Prof. Sung Yong Shin. Visiting researcher (6/2006 - 8/2006) Computer Graphics Lab, Dept. Complexity Science and Engineering, University of Tokyo. Software engineer (3/2000 - 2/2002) Lead programmer, Zoiment(R). Developed a rendering engine and user-interfaces for use in a 3D game (MagicBuilder). Publications Link Theses Motion Modeling for On-Line Motion Synthesis Taesoo Kwon, Ph. D. thesis, Dept. of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science, KAIST, August, 2007. View-dependent Shadow Maps using Projective Geometry (Written in Korean) Taesoo Kwon, M. S. thesis, Dept. of Computer Science, Seoul National University, February, 2002. Open source projects luna-gen Lua binding code generator written in pure lua. gitv git + vim + etags made easy. PaperCrop reformats PDF fies to be viewed on small screen devices.
